Bosm Roulette is an app based betting event using which one can predict the results of a match before its start.
 Each user is given a wallet balance of $100 in the beginning, using which one can bid on his favourite team.

 There are 2 types of bets:
 1. Normal Bet:
If a user bets $x on a particular match, if his prediction is correct, his wallet balance will increase by 2*x amount otherwise the balance will decrease by x/2 amount.
 2. Power Bet:
If a user bets $x on a particular match, if his prediction is correct, his wallet balance will increase by 4*x amount..... But if the user looses on that particular bid, his balance will reduce to 0, So be careful guys. The Power Bet will be active once every 4 hours so use this on the best team.

 Earning Additional Points
 1. Refer And Earn Policy:
 Users can refer the app using the Share button in the side drawer
 2. Spin and Earn:
 Try Your luck by spinning the wheel and earn additional bonus points.
